resources.string:
AnExplorer is a file explorer with a Zing!!!
 You can do lot more than just exploring your files.

 This tutorial gets you through the major stuff you can do with AnExplorer
You can see the overview of all available memories with their free memory / total memory.\n\n This is also present for apps and processes, so you know hows your system is running
\n\nJust optional, but makes you files more secure from others
Navigation pane lets you navigate from where ever you are to where ever you want.\n\n Swipe from left and you can see the navigation pane. It can come very handy

Lot of unique features in AnExplorer
 1.Folder sizes
 2.Preview for media files including audio
 3.Language change from within the app
 4.Themes you can choose from
Manage all your apps that are installed.\n Make backup of your apps. You can also delete the app if you dont like them
Manage all your apps that are running. \n You can stop the apps to clear up the memory
One unique feature of AnExplorer.\n Hide any folder from showing up in the gallery. You can easily unhide them whenever you want
Set wallpaper from all the wallpapers, picture etc.\n You can also set changing background automatically with bunch of wallpapers.

Jai Hind \m/ Peace \m/ 

 Lot of stuff? Very less? Impressive? Unimpressive?
 Like our app? love it? hate it? have suggestion?

 We would love to hear from you.
